content: {"name": "The Salvation Army Ray and Joan Kroc Corps Community Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* All clients must make an appointment either online below or by calling (617) 318-6940.\n* Appointments are ONCE a month!\n* Once your appointment time is confirmed, please arrive for your scheduled time.", "email": "", "url": "https://easternusa.salvationarmy.org/boston-kroc/help/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "650 Dudley Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Dorchester", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02125", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.31935759999999, "longitude": -71.0700145}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 318-6936", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
